Articles.Content:
As Bob looked out the window it was too soon

for the flying banana was set to go boom.

Mission control was biting their nails

As Gene checked his K-mails

The great ship was descending too fast

For the Flying Banana was part of the past

All that was left was the crew's seats

And two tons of canned beets.

But wait!

Kerbals don't eat beets

Gene showed the MC some vids of some Kittens, they where neat.

Jeb deployed the chute

As he let out a faint toot.

The cockpit made contact with the ground

The VAB let out a sound

For the crew landed on the tall building

That started tumbling

Hope you liked this rhyme

and that Jeb won't get fired for all-time.
